name: Ritu Chaturvedi
content: Ritu Chaturvedi | School of Computer Science Ritu Chaturvedi Associate ProfessorEmail: chaturvr@uoguelph.caPhone number: x53986Office: Reynolds 2211Website links: http://socs.uoguelph.ca/~chaturvr/ Research Statement My research interests broadly include Data Mining and Predictive modeling, especially educational data mining that caters to web-based tutoring systems such as Intelligent Tutoring Systems.
